article_title: Must-see morning clip: David Letterman delivers moving tribute to Robin Williams, his friend of 38 years
article_text:
Topics: David Letterman, robin williams, The Late Show, The Late Show With David Letterman, Video, Life News, Entertainment News

A week after the passing of beloved actor and comedian Robin Williams, “Late Show” host David Letterman paid tribute to his friend of 38 years. The 10-minute segment includes entertaining stories and tearful moments.

Letterman remembered Williams’ kindness — getting him a part on “Mork & Mindy” — and his incredible talent. Letterman described seeing Robin Williams for the first time at the Comedy Store: a “hurricane” of humor. He also showed a compilation of clips from the 50 times that Williams was a guest on “The Late Show.” Watch below:
